verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're caught in the middle,
Between the fire and the griddle,
O Lord, what can we do?
If we run away, we'll lose.
If we stay, He'll light the fuse
And totally blow us away.
We're caught in the middle,
Between the fire and the griddle,
But His nature is seeing us through.
We're caught in the middle,
Between the fire and the griddle,
Till suddenly all things become new.
